attributes.action: Make Army, Navy or Air Cadets compulsory subjects at school.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The "teammanship", the discipline and training learned in cadets will go a long way to stop the hooligans and thugs before they start.  

A grounding in cadets will give them discipline parents and teachers cannot.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
